bike.products

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • bike.products.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rentable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accessory, Bike

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rentable
    A class to represent a product sold at the shop. All products may be rented out for an hourly fee.
    Author:
    Eugene Koval

      Constructs a product with a manufacturer's price.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(Cost wholeSale,
               java.lang.String type,
               java.lang.String productNumber,
               java.lang.String make,
               java.lang.String model)
        Constructs a product with a manufacturer's price. This price is then used to calculate and set the rental deposit and hourly rental charge.
        Parameters:
        wholeSale - The manufacturer's price for this product.

    • Method Detail

        public abstract Product createProduct(java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Constructs a new Product with the given array of parameters. Parameters must be of the same data types as the product's constructor.
        Parameters:
        parameters - - the parameters with which to construct the product.
        Returns:
        the new product.
